DOC.brief_summary: The study prospective birth cohort study purpose describe status maternal key nutrient ( eg . folate vitamin D ) supplementation among pregnancy early gestation Shanghai , find association level serum key nutrient atopic dermatitis ( AD ) offsprings 6 month .
DOC.brief_title: Maternal Key Nutritional Factors Offspring 's Atopic Dermatitis ( MKNFOAD )
DOC.detailed_description: This study base Shanghai pregnancy population prospective birth cohort . The investigator obtain data participant ' folic acid vitamin D supplement intake questionnaire 12-14 gestational week . And investigator collect participant ' blood sample gestation directly detect biological exposure level folate vitamin D. In follow-up , skin barrier function evaluate time infant 24-48 hour , 42 day 6 month . During 6 month birth , incidence AD investigate offspring . This cohort study aim ( 1 ) clarify association prenatal key nutrient offspring AD ; ( 2 ) ass role maternal key nutrient skin barrier offspring . It good evidence AD prevention meaningful protocol reduce incidence AD unique design.Univariate multivariate association analyse perform identify risk factor AD use multivariate logistic regression model .
